item.description:
There are a number of new people coming to this month's meetup. So we'll again start with some brief introductions. For the next 3-4 months, I'll be I'll be giving some background information on the Qingcheng Mountain Daoist Qigong that I've studied and we'll practice some exercises.

This meeting will last 1 to 1-1/2 hours. Feel free to email me if you have any questions. I hope to see as many of you as possible.

Thanks,
Dee
item.how_to_find_us: The Lucia Mastrangelo Meeting Room is on the 2nd floor. Go up the stairs, turn right and right again, going through the reading room to the glass-walled meeting room. The room name is on the wall to the left of the door.
item.name: Getting to know us, pt 2 and getting started on the path.
